name: reycle
author: barbond
notes:
Got to KoG only using destiny heroes this season, tried a bunch of different stuff out and lost the final promo 3 times, tried this final revision and had a clean 5 wins against 3 fish and 2 aliens

Fusion plant gives you a lot of fuel and synergizes well with Maicious, Dreamer, and Celestial

can play defensively with Slash or Dangerous and mill yourself until you find your backrow answers, or go for a fast OTK with Trinity if youâ€™re confident
